name: Healthcare Services Group, Inc.
description: Healthcare Services Group, Inc. is a leading provider of management, maintenance, and food service solutions to the healthcare industry. Founded in 1977, HCSG operates in more than 4,000 healthcare facilities across the United States, delivering high-quality services that enhance the patient experience and support the operational needs of healthcare providers. The company specializes in three core areas: housekeeping, dietary, and laundry services, ensuring that facilities maintain a clean, safe, and welcoming environment for patients and staff alike. HCSG is dedicated to improving quality of life through its comprehensive range of services, which are tailored to meet the specific needs of each facility. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction and operational excellence, HCSG has built a reputation for reliability and professionalism in the healthcare services sector. The company is committed to employing best practices and innovative solutions to elevate the standards of service and care in healthcare environments. HCSG's mission is to provide superior service and value, fostering a culture of efficiency and respect in every interaction.

faq.answer: William D. Brown is the CEO of Healthcare Services Group, Inc.

faq.question: Where is HCSG headquartered?
faq.answer: HCSG is headquartered in Pennsauken Township, New Jersey, USA.
